mapper.select: SELECT * from etop_park_group as a join etop_settled as b WHERE a.settled_id=b.id and a.id=#{parkGroupId}
SELECT *,park_group_img parkGroupPreimg FROM etop_park_group_presentation WHERE park_group_id = #{parkGroupId} AND presentation = '1'
SELECT *,park_group_img parkGroupPreimg FROM etop_park_group_presentation WHERE park_group_id = #{parkGroupId} AND presentation = '2'
